class.name: SkeletonModificationStackHolder
class.brief_description: A modification that holds and executes a [SkeletonModificationStack].
class.description: This [SkeletonModification] holds a reference to a [SkeletonModificationStack], allowing you to use multiple modification stacks on a single [Skeleton3D]. [b]Note[/b]: The modifications in the held [SkeletonModificationStack] will only be executed if their execution mode matches the execution mode of the SkeletonModificationStackHolder.

method.name: get_held_modification_stack
method.description: Returns the [SkeletonModificationStack] that this modification is holding.

method.name: set_held_modification_stack
method.description: Sets the [SkeletonModificationStack] that this modification is holding. This modification stack will then be executed when this modification is executed.
